alert.note: Alert for Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:15PM MDT until June 11 at 11:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN HAAKON...EAST CENTRAL MEADE...NORTHEASTERN CUSTER... NORTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1014 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Grindstone Butte to 5 miles east of Quinn to 3 miles northwest of Scenic, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 959 PM, a 70 mph wind gust was reported 3 miles northwest of Wasta. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Delta 1 Launch Facility, Cactus Flat, Minuteman Missile Visitors Center, Grindstone Butte, Kadoka and Intersection of Highway 73 and White River. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 101 and 155. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
